text: The Museum of Arts and Traditions of Morocco (MATM) is a museum being built in Casablanca, Morocco. It is expected to open in 2018. In October 2017, Leïla Mezian Benjelloun laid the foundation stone of the new 1200 m² Museum of Arts and Traditions of Morocco (MATM) that she is building at the junction of Moulay Youssef Boulevard and Roudani Boulevard in Casablanca. The building will be 26 meters high and is budgeted to cost MAD 79 million. The architect is Tarik Oualalou. Completion is expected in 2018. ==References== Category:Museums in Morocco Category:Buildings and structures in Casablanca Category:2018 establishments in Morocco
title: Museum of Arts and Traditions of Morocco
